DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFCASE : AUTOMOBILES
DOC.TEXT: Off-Track Enterprise : Four-time Indianapolis 500 winner Al Unser won ' t be spending much time in Long_Beach watching the Indy-car races this weekend -- he ' ll be at the grand opening of the Al Unser Auto Care Center_on Beach Boulevard in Huntington Beach from 11 a.m. to 3 p.m. today , Saturday and Sunday . Unser has joined with financial partner Robert Smith to launch what they hope will become a chain of Unser centers . The inaugural location here is a 40 # 000-square-foot facility subdivided into quick-lube , brake , muffler , smog inspection and wheel alignment shops plus repair centers for domestic , Japanese and European cars .
